Flow.description: 25-07-14: Added Flat Fee Only (earned in increments) field to standard Post Consult form.
Flow.label: Post Consult Screen

fields.name: supervisingAttorneyMissing
fields.fieldText: Required Field Missing: You must select a Team Lead to proceed.

fields.name: typeOfLawMissing
fields.fieldText: Required Field Missing: You must select a Type of Law to proceed.

fields.name: typeOfCivilLawMissing
fields.fieldText: Required Field Missing: If Type of Law is 'Civil', you must select a Type of Civil Law to proceed.

fields.name: categoryMissing
fields.fieldText: Required Field Missing: You must select a Category to proceed.

fields.name: subcategoryMissing
fields.fieldText: Required Field Missing: If Type of Law is 'Civil', you must select a Subcategory to proceed.

fields.name: supervisingAttorneyRequired2
fields.fieldText: Please select a Supervising Attorney.

fields.name: typeOfLawRequired
fields.fieldText: Please select a Type of Law.

fields.name: typeOfCivilLawRequired
fields.fieldText: Please select a Type of Civil Law.

fields.name: categoryRequired
fields.fieldText: Please select a Category.

fields.name: subcategoryRequired
fields.fieldText: Please select a Subcategory.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Finish
fields.fieldText:
POST-CONSULT COMPLETE


The Post-Consult has been completed and submitted.


If you have any questions, please reach out to internal support.

fields.name: Copy_2_of_Finish
fields.fieldText:
POST-CONSULT COMPLETE


The Post-Consult has been completed and submitted.


If you have any questions, please reach out to internal support.

fields.name: ErrorMessage
fields.fieldText:
This Lead is missing a valid Clio Company ID. To resolve this, advance the Lead to one of the following statuses, then come back after approx. 10 minutes and try again:

  • Contacted
  • Qualified
  • Send Fee Agreement

fields.name: Finish
fields.fieldText:
POST-CONSULT COMPLETE


The Post-Consult has been completed and submitted.


If you have any questions, please reach out to internal support.
